channel.title: Shiny on Stats and R
channel.description: Recent content in Shiny on Stats and R

item.title: A guide on how to read statistical tables
item.description: Below a Shiny app to help you read the main statistical tables: Statistics-101 This Shiny app helps you to compute probabilities for the main probability distributions. How to use this app? Choose the distribution Set the paremeter(s) of the distribution Select whether you want to find the lower tail, upper tail or an interval Choose x On the right panel (or below depending on the size of your screen) you will see:
